Kathy OrdoÃ±ez is Chief Executive Officer of Celera and was a founder of Celera Diagnostics.

Prior to joining Applera in December of 2000, Kathy worked for fifteen years for Hoffmann La-Roche, a Swiss health care company. While at Roche, Kathy oversaw the formation of Roche Molecular Systems, where she served as president and Chief Executive Officer for nine years, and led the application of polymerase chain reaction technology to the diagnostic, research and forensic fields. She was also president of Roche Diagnostics Systems, and held a number of other business and managerial positions within Roche.

Before joining Roche, Kathy held several marketing and scientific positions in Baker Instruments, a Division of Richardson-Vicks, and Union Carbide Corporation. This included a three-year assignment in the Far East.
